meanings.definition: having the most bulge or protrusion
meanings.sent1: The bulgiest pumpkin at the fair won first prize.
meanings.sent2: Her suitcase was the bulgiest among all the travelers.
meanings.sent3: The bulgiest balloon in the parade popped with a loud bang.
meanings.sent4: The bulgiest cloud in the sky cast a shadow over the field.
meanings.sent5: The bulgiest tree in the forest stood out with its massive trunk.

meanings.definition: to bulge or protrude the most
meanings.sent1: The bulgiest part of the bag was where the books were stacked.
meanings.sent2: His cheeks looked bulgiest when he stuffed them with marshmallows.
meanings.sent3: The bulgiest bubble in the gum burst all over his face.
meanings.sent4: The bulgiest rock in the garden made it hard to mow the lawn.
meanings.sent5: The bulgiest tire on the car needed to be replaced for safety reasons.
